ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only robes
ygData.msgSnippet: just curious where can you buy the gold robe at? ... From: Sloop To: eqenchanters@onelist.com Sent: Sunday, July 04, 1999 12:54 PM Subject: [eqenchanters]
ygData.messageBody:
just curious where can you buy the gold robe at?
----- Original Message -----
From: Sloop
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, July 04, 1999 12:54 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] enchanter only robes


Although I could by this point easily have an FBR or something of the sort, I stick with my Gold Senior Apprentice robe, just because it's enchanter only. Think of it as 'Enchanter Pride'. I think that there should be some decent enchanter only robes, which of course would be quest items, and no trade/ no drop, and lore. This goes for the other spellcasting classes as well.
-Sloop
